thread.title: Samsung chairman named as suspect in $7.5 million tax evasion case

title: Samsung chairman named as suspect in $7.5 million tax evasion case
text:
Samsung chairman named as suspect in $7.5 million tax evasion case Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:26 
Barely days after his son's release from jail, Samsung Chairman Lee Kun-hee has been named a suspect in a $7.5 million tax evasion case. Sarah Charlton reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Barely days after his son's release from jail, Samsung Chairman Lee Kun-hee has been named a suspect in a $7.5 million tax evasion case. Sarah Charlton reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2skly1O
